spatial_accuracy.notes: Living/dining/kitchen are generally located in the correct top half, and bedrooms/bathrooms in the lower half, but several layout specifics deviate: kitchen geometry is changed (peninsula/island-like form vs the plan’s tighter L/galley with defined counter runs), the left-side stepped/notched perimeter and small internal offsets are simplified/shifted, and the hall/entry/door relationships read more open than the plan. Window/door positions do not consistently match the 2D locations, and room proportions (especially living area depth and left wing width) appear distorted compared to the plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Primary adjacency is mostly preserved (living adjacent to kitchen/dining; bedrooms off the main hall), but fidelity breaks on exterior features and openings: a balcony/terrace is introduced on the living-room side that is not present in the 2D plan, and several wall offsets and thickness cues from the plan are not maintained. Door embedding/orientation is inconsistent with the plan’s swing placements (notably around the hall/bath/bedroom thresholds), and some closet/utility partitioning appears merged or reinterpreted.

furniture_mapping.notes: Major furniture beats are plausible (sofa grouping and dining table in the living zone; beds in both bedrooms), but placement does not tightly follow the plan (kitchen work triangle and dining alignment relative to counters/windows differs). Scale is generally consistent, though some circulation clearances look wider than the plan implies.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Camera is a reasonable isometric-like view but shows perspective rather than strict isometric/orthographic. Lighting is even but flat; geometry is mostly clean with minor softness/low-detail materials. Overall composition is clear, but opening details (doors/windows) are not crisply legible for verification.

detected_errors.description: Hallucinated balcony/terrace with exterior railing adjacent to the living/dining area; this element is not shown in the 2D floor plan.
Kitchen layout mis-modeled: counter/appliance run configuration differs from the plan’s L-shaped/galley arrangement (peninsula/island-like massing and repositioned runs).
Proportion distortion: living area depth/width relationship and the left wing width/read of the stepped perimeter do not match the plan’s measured outline and notches.
Exterior wall alignment errors: the plan’s stepped/notched exterior geometry on the left side is simplified/shifted in the 3D model, changing room edge conditions.
Door placement/orientation mismatches around the central hall/bath/bedroom thresholds; swings/opening positions do not consistently align with the 2D plan.
Window placement inconsistencies: fenestration appears added/shifted on some exterior walls relative to the plan’s specific window locations (beyond the main living-room window wall).
Closet/partition details appear missing or merged: the plan’s smaller closet/coat storage separations are not clearly or consistently represented as distinct enclosed spaces.
